nodes.text: Loddu was a Hutt in charge of the space station that would later be known as Mek-Sha during the Galactic War. When the Hutt Cartel annexed Makeb, Loddu received few profits from it and decided to establish his own enterprise by claiming a resource-filled asteroid. Months after, he was killed for his own neglicence, by forcing explosions on the mining station to increase productivity.
